entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Melita
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:59 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -14.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Melita 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -14.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 77 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -17.3°C
Wind: SSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 31. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then light overnight. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 43 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 30 with temperature rising to minus 22 by morning.
